lines.text: [Often cited as the first time the word "fuck" was heard in the cinema]
Get out of here, you fucking bastard!
As the pin said to the magnet.
What are you going to do, anyway?
I'm going to find an honest job.
He's a one-ulcer man in a two-ulcer job.
It's one of the 32 known Vermeers - 80 of which are in America.

[after Quint has terrifyingly smashed up his entire office with an axe]
Andrew, darling, you're always threatening to resign...
